comment.author: 28490317@N07
comment._content:
I found this picture while searching for his son John.  John and I served together in the USAF from 1968-1970.  He and I were close friends.  After leaving the Air Force, I stayed at Admiral Eckstrom's house in Coronado for a period of time.  The Admiral and I were the official "dog feeders" (1/2 can - 1/2 dry).  Their house was magnificent.   I ended up going to medical school and ended up in Canandaigua NY.  In 1991, I got a call from John stating that he had developed a brain tumor.  I reviewed his CT scans for him but nothing could be done.  John died shortly after that.  John was a great man, and so was his father from the little I knew when I stayed at their house.
Ben Lankheet MD
